alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 17 at 5:25PM MDT until March 17 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
